comment: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.
inlinecomment: ' Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.

methods.label: addTestSuite
methods.comment: Loads a TestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.signature: Public Function addTestSuite(testSuite As TestSuite) As AbstractCustomTester
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Loads a TestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

methods.label: runTests
methods.comment: Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester
  
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
